text: Ana maaŋ muuŋv kɨrga, ana wo gari guma bakɨme zɨrga tuga nzuav garav ki fhuvara. Ana vhɨra ana zɨrga tuga kaŋgi fhuvara. Ana maaŋ muuŋv kɨrim, ana gari guma bakɨme hanera ana hɨgɨp, ana gangip, ana guigira muumbara mbatɨgar ana muuŋv, ana ndim mba ana buni kaadogi gumgi ki ŋaneŋ khɨngirim, ana mbe phorgɨ kɨrga.
